com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.operator

Class AbstractNestedOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.tools.AbstractObservable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>
      • com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
        • com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.operator.AbstractNestedOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NestedOperator, com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.ConfigurationListener, com.rapidminer.gui.wizards.PreviewListener, com.rapidminer.operator.annotation.ResourceConsumer, com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.LoggingHandler, com.rapidminer.tools.Observable<com.rapidminer.operator.Operator>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateOperator, DistinctOperator, FilterOperator, GenerateAttributes, JoinOperator, Multiply, RenameOperator, RetrieveOperator, SampleOperator, SelectOperator, SortOperator, StoreOperator, UnionOperator

    public abstract class AbstractNestedOperator
extends com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
implements NestedOperator
    In-database NestedOperator that has exactly one output port and zero, one or more input port. All ports use DbTableExampleSet.
